name: Future Bass
description: Woozy, detuned synthesizers, 7th chords, harsh basslines, syncopated percussion with fast-paced hi-hats and a melodic, carefree atmosphere.

children.name: Kawaii Future Bass
children.description: "Cute" style of Future Bass rooted in anime and video game culture; emerged in Japan in the mid-2010s.
